Line1.6D03F: Mephisto, Lord of Hatred. Father of Lilith.
Line11.6D03F: (sigh) So be it. When you’re ready, speak the name Dul’Mephistos.
Line3.6D03F: You need to be careful. Her blood is already a part of you.
Line7.6D03F: See? The power here is already agitating you.
Line9.BAE4: I told you I can handle it. Tell me what to say, and then go search for the temple.
VoiceDir1.6D03F: Grave--Lorath sees a shrine to Mephisto ahead and comments on it.
VoiceDir7.6D03F: Warning, taken aback by the Player snapping at him
